## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G28230](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G28230)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MED20, MED20A</u>
- **Gene Name:** MEDIATOR 20, MEDIATOR 20A
- **Description:**   TATA-binding related factor (TRF) of subunit 20 of Mediator complex;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
